```{r}
# load libraries and source functions 
source(here::here("r/functions.R")) 
setup_icfp()

# load pma cross-sectional samples  
dat <- read_ipums_micro(
 ddi = here("data/cross-sectional.xml"),
 data = here("data/cross-sectional.dat.gz")
)

```

# Mapping 

```{r}
gps <- here("data/gps.rds.gz") %>% read_rds
shapes <- here("data/top_shapes.rds.gz") %>% read_rds

tm_shape(shapes) + 
  tm_borders() + 
  tm_facets(by = "SAMPLE", nrow = 2) +
  tm_shape(gps) + 
  tm_dots() +
  tm_scale_bar(width = 0.2, text.size = 1) + 
  tm_layout(
    frame.lwd = 0,
    main.title.position = c("center", "top"),
    frame = T,
    panel.label.bg.color = "white",
    panel.label.size = 2,
    between.margin = 0,
    inner.margins = 0.02,
    outer.margins = .05,
    main.title = "PMA Samples \n ",
    fontfamily = "cabrito"
  )

```
